column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////They have a downstairs
column2: which I haven't been down to yet
column3: but would love to try out next time. I've heard it's quieter and more intimate. You can make reservations through OpenTable
column4: which will save you the wait! Also
column5: know that the bar has full menu for food
column6: just in case you don't want to wait for a table!
